tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE translations (
  translation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  original_text TEXT,
  translated_text TEXT,
  source_language VARCHAR,
  target_language VARCHAR,
  translation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE parallel_text_data (
  text_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  original_text TEXT,
  translated_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE translation_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  text_id INT,
  translation_date TIMESTAMP,
  translator_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE translators (
  translator_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  translator_name VARCHAR(50),
  language_pairs TEXT[],
  last_active DATE
)

CREATE TABLE translations (
  translation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  source_language VARCHAR(50),
  target_language VARCHAR(50),
  source_text TEXT,
  target_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE translations_history (
  history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  translation_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  project_id INT,
  translation_status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (translation_id) REFERENCES translations(translation_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE translations (
    translation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_language VARCHAR(50),
    target_language VARCHAR(50),
    translated_text TEXT,
    translation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE languages (
    language_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    language_name VARCHAR(50),
    country_of_origin VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE texts (
    text_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    text_id INT,
    source_language VARCHAR(50),
    target_language VARCHAR(50),
    request_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (text_id) REFERENCES texts(text_id)
)
